heroTitle: NEW RESTAURANT IN THE CENTER OF BELGRADE
ourStoryParagraphOne: Restaurant, bar and caffe April Beograd allows its visitors to enjoy an exclusive and luxurious ambient along with top-quality food. To top it off, April Beograd is located in the center of Belgrade.
ourStoryParagraphTwo: Thanks to many years of experience in catering industry, we have managed to reach the peak of our business by offering a quality diverse menu, fast and quality service, good atmosphere, all in a cozy and modern environment, and in an attractive location.
reservationQuote: “Life, if well lived, is long enough.”
